briefTitle: A Clinical Trial to Reduce Skin Burn Induced by Breast Radiotherapy Using Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy (IMRT)
officialTitle: A Phase III Study of Adjuvant Radiation Therapy in Early Breast Cancer Comparing the Use of Breast Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy (IMRT) to Conventional Wedge Technique
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Maximum skin toxicity measured weekly during the tratment and bi-weekly up to one month after the end of the treatment and complete resolution of skin reaction using the NCI common toxicity criteria version 3.0 scale
